all_concepts: Reduced number of junctions for leakages
High reliability with no mechanical moving parts
Oil level monitoring with electro-optic sensor
Solenoid valve for oil filling and alarm output
Relay output contact for alarm indication
Pressure range 130bar with custom limits available
Electrical connection via Industry Standard Connectors
Application selection for compressors and refrigeration systems
Troubleshooting common issues with oil level sensors
technical_specs: Some advantages of this solution: Extremely compact dimensions
Left/Right mounting possibility with the same TK3+ • Reduction of the number of junctions in the circuit with less possibility of having leakages
Direct sight glass replacement (3/4/6 holes flange connection)
Integrated filtering element in series with the valve.
The TK3+ monitors the oil level with the embedded electro-optic sensor and comprises a solenoid valve for oil filling and a relay output contact to give an alarm.
Each TK3+ requires 30VA (depending on the solenoid valve)
Suggested ordering codes not include oil strainer element. Adapters must be ordered separately.

key_concepts: Reduced number of junctions for leakages
High reliability with no mechanical moving parts
iconic_quotes: Some advantages of this solution: Extremely compact dimensions
Left/Right mounting possibility with the same TK3+ • Reduction of the number of junctions in the circuit with less possibility of having leakages
Direct sight glass replacement (3/4/6 holes flange connection)

qa_pairs.question: What is the advantage of using a left/right mounting possibility for the TK3+?
qa_pairs.answer: The left/right mounting possibility with the same TK3+ reduces the number of junctions in the circuit, resulting in less possibility of having leakages. This simplifies the installation process and improves overall reliability.

qa_pairs.question: How does the direct sight glass replacement feature work?
qa_pairs.answer: The direct sight glass replacement feature allows for easy access to the sight glass, making it possible to inspect and replace it without having to disconnect the entire unit. This is achieved through a 3/4/6 holes flange connection, which provides flexibility in terms of installation options.

natural_questions: What pressure range does TK3+ 130bar support?
How do I select between TK3+ and TK4?
file_metadata.summary: The TK3+ 130bar CO2 oil level controller is a compact and reliable solution for controlling oil levels in CO2 systems. Its left/right mounting possibility reduces the number of junctions, simplifying installation and improving overall reliability.
